name: Ability Pong
description:
This game is made for the Brackeys game jam 2023.1.
Controls:-
Player1:
Move up - W
Move down - S
Use Ability - V
Player2:
Move up - Up Arrow
Move Down - Down Arrow
Use Ability - K
Software Used:-
Game Engine - Godot Engine
Art - Piskel
Sound Effects - jfxr
Some of the sound effects are from Kenney.
